import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from "react-redux"; import "../../assets/styles/checkout.css"; import ContainerToastComponent from "../../components/ToastMessageComponents/ContainerToastComponent"; const CheckOut = () => { const cartStore = useSelector((state) => state.cart.listProducts); const [toasts, setToasts] = useState([]); const [shippingValue, setShippingValue] = useState(null); const [total, setTotal] = useState(0); useEffect(() => { setTotal( cartStore.reduce( (total, product) => total + product.priceProduct * product.quantityProduct, 0 ) ); total >= 1000000 ? setShippingValue(0) : setShippingValue(30000); }, [cartStore, total]); const hanldeChangeShippingMethod = (value) => { setShippingValue(Number(value)); }; console.log(shippingValue); const handleCheckOut = () => {}; return (

); }; export default CheckOut;
